column1: EXPLAIN ANALYZE CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE nyvnxztazmrbalat AS SELECT round(random() * 1000) id FROM generate_series(1, 1000000)
EXPLAIN ANALYZE
SELECT nyvnxztazmrbalat.id FROM nyvnxztazmrbalat WHERE nyvnxztazmrbalat.id = 250
UNION
SELECT nyvnxztazmrbalat.id FROM nyvnxztazmrbalat WHERE nyvnxztazmrbalat.id = 750
